div.h2: THE ONLY K-6 CHARTER SCHOOL INSPIRED BY WALDORF EDUCATION IN PROVO
div.p:
For Treeside Kindergarten Parents: Please look under the "information" tab for information on how to sign your student up for Spanish/English Dual Immersion.
COVID 19 School is closed until May 1st. Spring Break is April 6th through 10th.
Nurturing the leaders, lifelong learners, innovators, and artisans of tomorrow.
Learning becomes memorable as it is delivered through art, music, movement, and nature.
Learning is mastered through practical and project based activities.
Students are inspired to learn by engaging in analytical, critical, and creative thought processes.
I'm so excited to have found Treeside! It's exactly the kind of education I've been waiting for.
Treeside values the developmental stages of childhood. As a parent, that's paramount to me.
I was going to home school my daughter. Now, I don't have to!

address.p:
A tuition-free, public charter
school serving grades K-6.
